definition: belly/skin/to state/to pass on information/to display
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
Grand Herald in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]

sentences.english: Rearrange the sentences in the story. Story 1.
sentences.chinese: 出示故事中的不按挨次臚列的句子。

sentences.english: The point needs no laboring. That is all that need be said.
sentences.chinese: 這一點無須臚陳，這就是所有要說的。

sentences.english: In the court, the witness was required to dwell on what he had seen.
sentences.chinese: 在法庭上，目擊者被要求臚陳他所見到的事件。

sentences.english: As the new words are not collected in The Chinese Words Dictionary, we list them here for discussion.
sentences.chinese: 由於《漢語大詞典》均失收，特臚列於此，以供討論。

sentences.english: We enumerate every kind of the publications, and make a brief analysis of them.
sentences.chinese: 本文臚列各期刊物，並作簡要分析。

definition: groom or chariot driver employed by a noble (old)
